WorkItem.Description:
In the "06largescale.php" test file, if I add a line return (\n) and activate "wrap" for a cell, OpenOffice can't open it.

exemple :
```
// Add data
for ($i = 2; $i <= 5000; $i++) {
	$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('A' . $i, "FName $i")
	                              ->setCellValue('B' . $i, "LName $i")
	                              ->setCellValue('C' . $i, "Phone\nNo $i")
	                              ->setCellValue('D' . $i, "FaxNo $i")
	                              ->setCellValue('E' . $i, true);
								  $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('C'.$i)->getAlignment()->setWrapText(true);
}
```
For a limited loop (for exemple 100), OpenOffice can open it but data are repeated (in the C column).
more I go down in the file, less data are repeated

exemple of content for the cell C1 :
> Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2Pho
neNo 2

Attached file is the result of a loop based on 100 items.

If I open the "06largescale.xlsx" with "Microsoft Office EXCEL 2007", there is no problem.
If the file is writed in "Excel5" (xls) format, there is no problem (on OpenOffice as well as on EXCEL).

OpenOffice version : 3.4.1

Does anyone else have this problem?
WorkItem.Summary: Repeated cell value with line return in XLSX on OpenOffice

Comments.Message:
additional information : 

if I test with a loop up to 16 items, there is no problem at all (data are not repeated)
```
for ($i = 2; $i <= 16; $i++) {
```

After 16 items, data start to be repeated.
Every 16 items (17, 33, 49, ....) data are repeated one more time :
17->32 => data are repeated 1 time (1original + 1 repeated)
33->48 => data are repeated 2 times (1original + 2 repeated)
49->64 => data are repeated 3 times (1original + 3 repeated)

Maybe it's related to pagepreak, or page size or something like that.
I have the exact same problem in OpenOffice 3.4.1 and PHPExcel 1.7.8, I tried Libre Office and it works fine there.

Same problem with PHPExcel 1.7.8 & OpenOffice 4.0.1.

Work with Excel 2010 (14.0.6023.1000)
PHPExcel 1.7.8 is not going to be changed in any way as it's an old version, does this problem occur with PHPExcel 1.7.9, and is the problem in PHPExcel or in OpenOffice?

It doesn't work either with PHPExcel 1.7.9

But maybe is the problem in OpenOffice :
https://issues.apache.org/ooo/show_bug.cgi?id=123022

I try to load a file generated by PHPExcel in Excel 2010 and save it but i can't open it in OpenOffice.
